hibernate-mapping.query: select new LedgerDTO (rp.ACODE, rp.HOMECREDIT, rp.HOMEDEBIT, rp.HOMEOCREDIT, rp.HOMEODEBIT) from MNMVIW00011 as rp where rp.CASH = 1 and convert(char(10),rp.DATE_TIME,111) between :date1 and :date2 and rp.SOURCEBR= :sourcebr and rp.WORKSTATION = :workstation and rp.Active = true order by rp.DATE_TIME

select new LedgerDTO (rp.ACODE, rp.HOMECREDIT , rp.HOMEDEBIT, rp.HOMEOCREDIT , rp.HOMEODEBIT ) from MNMVIW00011 as rp where rp.CASH = 1 and convert(char(10),rp.SETTLEMENTDATE,111) between :date1 and :date2 and rp.SOURCEBR= :sourcebr and rp.WORKSTATION = :workstation and rp.Active = true order by rp.DATE_TIME

select new LedgerDTO (rp.ACODE, rp.CREDIT, rp.DEBIT, rp.OCREDIT, rp.ODEBIT) from MNMVIW00011 as rp where rp.CASH = 1 and convert(char(10),rp.DATE_TIME,111) between :date1 and :date2 and rp.SOURCECUR = :sourcecur and rp.SOURCEBR= :sourcebr and rp.WORKSTATION = :workstation and rp.Active = true order by rp.DATE_TIME

select new LedgerDTO (rp.ACODE, rp.CREDIT, rp.DEBIT, rp.OCREDIT, rp.ODEBIT) from MNMVIW00011 as rp where rp.CASH = 1 and convert(char(10),rp.SETTLEMENTDATE,111) between :date1 and :date2 and rp.SOURCECUR = :sourcecur and rp.SOURCEBR= :sourcebr and rp.WORKSTATION = :workstation and rp.Active = true order by rp.DATE_TIME

select new LedgerDTO ( rp.ACTYPE, Sum(rp.HOMECREDIT), Sum(rp.HOMEDEBIT) ) from MNMVIW00011 as rp where rp.ACODE= :acode and (convert(char(10),rp.DATE_TIME,111) between :date1 and :date2 ) and rp.WORKSTATION = :workstation and rp.SOURCEBR = :sourcebr and rp.Active = true group by rp.ACTYPE

select new LedgerDTO ( rp.ACTYPE, Sum(rp.HOMECREDIT), Sum(rp.HOMEDEBIT) ) from MNMVIW00011 as rp where rp.ACODE= :acode and convert(char(10),rp.SETTLEMENTDATE,111) between :date1 and :date2 and rp.SOURCEBR= :sourcebr and rp.WORKSTATION = :workstation and rp.SOURCEBR = :sourcebr and rp.Active = true group by rp.ACTYPE

select new LedgerDTO ( rp.ACTYPE, Sum(rp.CREDIT), Sum(rp.DEBIT) ) from MNMVIW00011 as rp where rp.ACODE= :acode and convert(char(10),rp.DATE_TIME,111) between :date1 and :date2 and rp.SOURCECUR = :sourcecur and rp.SOURCEBR= :sourcebr and rp.WORKSTATION = :workstation and rp.Active = true group by rp.ACTYPE

select new LedgerDTO ( rp.ACTYPE, Sum(rp.CREDIT), Sum(rp.DEBIT) ) from MNMVIW00011 as rp where rp.ACODE= :acode and convert(char(10),rp.SETTLEMENTDATE,111) between :date1 and :date2 and rp.SOURCECUR = :sourcecur and rp.SOURCEBR= :sourcebr and rp.WORKSTATION = :workstation and rp.Active = true group by rp.ACTYPE

select new LedgerDTO (rp.ACODE, rp.DATE_TIME, rp.SETTLEMENTDATE, rp.ACTYPE, rp.DESP, rp.HOMECREDIT, rp.HOMEDEBIT, rp.HOMEOCREDIT, rp.HOMEODEBIT, rp.NARRATION) from MNMVIW00011 as rp where rp.CASH = 1 and convert(char(10),rp.DATE_TIME,111) between :startDate and :endDate and rp.SOURCEBR= :sourcebr and rp.WORKSTATION = :workstation and rp.Active = true order by rp.DATE_TIME

select new LedgerDTO (rp.ACODE, rp.DATE_TIME, rp.SETTLEMENTDATE, rp.ACTYPE, rp.DESP, rp.HOMECREDIT, rp.HOMEDEBIT, rp.HOMEOCREDIT, rp.HOMEODEBIT, rp.NARRATION) from MNMVIW00011 as rp where convert(char(10),rp.DATE_TIME,111) between :startDate and :endDate and rp.SOURCEBR= :sourcebr and rp.WORKSTATION = :workstation and rp.Active = true order by rp.DATE_TIME

select new LedgerDTO (rp.ACODE, rp.DATE_TIME, rp.SETTLEMENTDATE, rp.ACTYPE, rp.DESP, rp.HOMECREDIT, rp.HOMEDEBIT, rp.HOMEOCREDIT, rp.HOMEODEBIT, rp.NARRATION ) from MNMVIW00011 as rp where rp.ACODE= :acode and convert(char(10),rp.DATE_TIME,111) between :startDate and :endDate and rp.SOURCEBR= :sourcebr and rp.WORKSTATION = :workstation and rp.Active = true order by rp.DATE_TIME

select new LedgerDTO (rp.ACODE, rp.DATE_TIME, rp.SETTLEMENTDATE, rp.ACTYPE, rp.DESP, rp.HOMECREDIT, rp.HOMEDEBIT, rp.HOMEOCREDIT, rp.HOMEODEBIT, rp.NARRATION ) from MNMVIW00011 as rp where rp.CASH = 1 and convert(char(10),rp.SETTLEMENTDATE,111) between :startDate and :endDate and rp.SOURCEBR= :sourcebr and rp.WORKSTATION = :workstation and rp.Active = true order by rp.DATE_TIME

select new LedgerDTO (rp.ACODE, rp.DATE_TIME, rp.SETTLEMENTDATE, rp.ACTYPE, rp.DESP, rp.HOMECREDIT, rp.HOMEDEBIT, rp.HOMEOCREDIT, rp.HOMEODEBIT, rp.NARRATION ) from MNMVIW00011 as rp where convert(char(10),rp.SETTLEMENTDATE,111) between :startDate and :endDate and rp.SOURCEBR= :sourcebr and rp.WORKSTATION = :workstation and rp.Active = true order by rp.DATE_TIME

select new LedgerDTO (rp.ACODE, rp.DATE_TIME, rp.SETTLEMENTDATE, rp.ACTYPE, rp.DESP, rp.HOMECREDIT, rp.HOMEDEBIT, rp.HOMEOCREDIT, rp.HOMEODEBIT, rp.NARRATION ) from MNMVIW00011 as rp where rp.ACODE= :acode and convert(char(10),rp.SETTLEMENTDATE,111) between :startDate and :endDate and rp.SOURCEBR= :sourcebr and rp.WORKSTATION = :workstation and rp.Active = true order by rp.DATE_TIME

select new LedgerDTO (rp.ACODE, rp.DATE_TIME, rp.SETTLEMENTDATE, rp.ACTYPE, rp.DESP, rp.CREDIT, rp.DEBIT, rp.OCREDIT, rp.ODEBIT, rp.NARRATION) from MNMVIW00011 as rp where rp.CASH = 1 and convert(char(10),rp.DATE_TIME,111) between :startDate and :endDate and rp.SOURCECUR = :sourcecur and rp.SOURCEBR= :sourcebr and rp.WORKSTATION = :workstation and rp.Active = true order by rp.DATE_TIME

select new LedgerDTO (rp.ACODE, rp.DATE_TIME, rp.SETTLEMENTDATE, rp.ACTYPE, rp.DESP, rp.CREDIT, rp.DEBIT, rp.OCREDIT, rp.ODEBIT, rp.NARRATION) from MNMVIW00011 as rp where convert(char(10),rp.DATE_TIME,111) between :startDate and :endDate and rp.SOURCECUR = :sourcecur and rp.SOURCEBR= :sourcebr and rp.WORKSTATION = :workstation and rp.Active = true order by rp.DATE_TIME

select new LedgerDTO (rp.ACODE, rp.DATE_TIME, rp.SETTLEMENTDATE, rp.ACTYPE, rp.DESP, rp.CREDIT, rp.DEBIT, rp.OCREDIT, rp.ODEBIT, rp.NARRATION ) from MNMVIW00011 as rp where rp.ACODE= :acode and convert(char(10),rp.DATE_TIME,111) between :startDate and :endDate and rp.SOURCECUR = :sourcecur and rp.SOURCEBR= :sourcebr and rp.WORKSTATION = :workstation and rp.Active = true order by rp.DATE_TIME

select new LedgerDTO (rp.ACODE, rp.DATE_TIME, rp.SETTLEMENTDATE, rp.ACTYPE, rp.DESP, rp.CREDIT, rp.DEBIT, rp.OCREDIT, rp.ODEBIT, rp.NARRATION) from MNMVIW00011 as rp where rp.CASH = 1 and convert(char(10),rp.SETTLEMENTDATE,111) between :startDate and :endDate and rp.SOURCECUR = :sourcecur and rp.SOURCEBR= :sourcebr and rp.WORKSTATION = :workstation and rp.Active = true order by rp.DATE_TIME

select new LedgerDTO (rp.ACODE, rp.DATE_TIME, rp.SETTLEMENTDATE, rp.ACTYPE, rp.DESP, rp.CREDIT, rp.DEBIT, rp.OCREDIT, rp.ODEBIT, rp.NARRATION) from MNMVIW00011 as rp where convert(char(10),rp.SETTLEMENTDATE,111) between :startDate and :endDate and rp.SOURCECUR = :sourcecur and rp.SOURCEBR= :sourcebr and rp.WORKSTATION = :workstation and rp.Active = true order by rp.DATE_TIME

select new LedgerDTO (rp.ACODE, rp.DATE_TIME, rp.SETTLEMENTDATE, rp.ACTYPE, rp.DESP, rp.CREDIT, rp.DEBIT, rp.OCREDIT, rp.ODEBIT, rp.NARRATION) from MNMVIW00011 as rp where rp.ACODE= :acode and convert(char(10),rp.SETTLEMENTDATE,111) between :startDate and :endDate and rp.SOURCECUR = :sourcecur and rp.SOURCEBR= :sourcebr and rp.WORKSTATION = :workstation and rp.Active = true order by rp.DATE_TIME
